text: "Heaven" is a 1989 song by American glam metal band Warrant. It is the second single from their debut studio album Dirty Rotten Filthy Stinking Rich. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 5 in Canada, number 4 in Norway, number 54 in Australia and number 93 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Warrant songs
title: Heaven (Warrant song)
